name: BulletinIntelligenceBriefings
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bulletin intelligence
des:
The official Bulletin Intelligence Alexa skill. Listen to your daily intelligence briefing with any Alexa supported device. Easy to use voice commands let you control which stories and sections you want to listen to.

You must already be receiving a Bulletin Intelligence briefing before you can use the Bulletin Intelligence Alexa Skill. 

This skill requires you verify the email address you use to receive your Bulletin Intelligence briefings.
